leaflet.constituency: Central Scotland, Glasgow, Highlands and Islands, Lothian, Mid Scotland and Fife, North East Scotland, South Scotland and West Scotland

messages.title: Put Recovery FIRST
messages.content: I hope you will agree that we must put recovery from this pandemic first. We must have a needle-sharp focus on cutting waits for mental health treatment, creating jobs, bouncing back education and action on climate change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting waits for mental health treatment.
Creating jobs to avoid a generation of unemployment.
Bouncing back education to make Scottish education the best again.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives have been branded 'shameless and nasty*.' The Conservatives and others are under performance for their role during Brexit at a time of crisis.
issues.economy: If we want to change, invest in jobs to avoid a generation of unemployment.
issues.education: We need to make Scottish education the best again.
issues.governance: Boris Johnson has brought chaos to the pandemic response and through Brexit at a time of crisis. His Scottish Conservatives have been branded 'shameless and nasty*.'
issues.health: We must have a needle-sharp focus on cutting waits for mental health treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will agree that we must put recovery from this pandemic first. The country needs to come together to put recovery first rather than dividing with another referendum.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of the Scottish Liberal Democrats

quotes.text: The Conservatives and others are under performance for their role during Brexit at a time of crisis.

images.caption: Willie Rennie, Leader of the Scottish Liberal Democrats
